ReturnPolicy.Description: If I have mistakenly seriously mis-described an item then I will be happy to refund THE PURCHASED ITEM PLUS POSTAGE COST. Please ensure that you are happy that size, colour, dimensions and all other details are correct and suitable for your purposes before you bid. I am happy to answer any questions before the auction ends and to provide further information if required.

ConditionDescription: Excellent  vintage condition, Gorgeous 1940/50s coloured glass gemstones set in a pair of striking gold tone bejewelled hands with glass gemstone rings.
Title: RARE VINTAGE  1940/50s MULTI COLOURED PASTE GEMSTONES GOLD HAND RING HOLDER
Description: THIS IS A VERY UNUSUAL 1940/50s MULTI COLOURED GLASS PASTE GEMSTONES IN TWO DIFFERENT HANDS WHICH CLASP TOGETHER GOLD TONE BROOCH PIN CLASP. EACH SIDE HAS DIFFERENT COLOURED CZECH GLASS PASTE GEM STONES WITH A DIFFERENT GLASS GEMSTONE RING ON EACH HAND. ONE SIDE IS MISSING TWO GLASS GEMSTONES FROM THE CUFF THE OTHER SIDE IS PERFECT PLEASE LOOK AT MY PHOTOS! The glass gemstones are a super colour combination and they look fabulous . A real showpiece and definitely a conversation piece! THIS IS A GORGEOUS AND HIGHLY DESIRABLE VINTAGE PIECE OF HIGH END COSTUME JEWELLERY! I am very happy to send you more photos or answer any questions that I can! THANK YOU FOR LOOKING! Please check out my other items! and be sure to add me to your favourites list!. I AM EXTREMELY HAPPY TO PROVIDE POSTAL DISCOUNTS ON MULTIPLE PURCHASES. I AM SELLING ALL ITEMS OF JEWELLERY THAT I NO LONGER WEAR OR NEED OR HAVE INHERITED. PLEASE NOTE as many of my items are antique or vintage they may need a gentle clean or polish. I do not do this as collectors prefer the patina of vintage age.
